entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
